bioconda.name: finestructure
bioconda.summary: fineSTRUCTURE is a fast and powerful algorithm for identifying population structure using dense sequencing data.

biocontainers.name: finestructure
biocontainers.summary: fineSTRUCTURE is a fast and powerful algorithm for identifying population structure using dense sequencing data.

biotools.summary: fineSTRUCTURE is an algorithm for identifying population structure using dense sequencing data. By using the output of ChromoPainter as a (nearly) sufficient summary statistic, it is able to perform model-based Bayesian clustering on large datasets, including full resequencing data, and can handle up to 1000s of individuals. Full assignment uncertainty is given.
